title: SION ULT RANDOMLY STOPS AFTER CAST BUG [GAMEPLAY]
body:
Hi,

I'd like to talk about a bug that has happened to me multiple times while playing Sion.
The bug is really straight forward about whats happening but i found it really hard to find out what makes it happen, and still am not 100% sure what causes the bug to occur.
The bug is as followed ( from personal experience ); you flash and immediately after use your ultimate and you instantly stop in place stunned and going on cooldown as if you hit a wall. This doesn't cause the ult to cancel 100% of the time, but this is the best cause i could find as i tried it in the practice tool. 
I tried looking up the bug and havent seen anyone post / encounter it yet so i thought i'd get the job done.

That's all i got to say thanks in advance! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

( I have replays of it happening but im not sure how to post them on here if anyone could help me out)

replies.body: Q: why would you flash into R? its not a big problem if it no matters amigo

I stated that im not 100% sure about what the cause could be but it seemed to happen after i flash into r and you might want to flash r in some scenarios, for example flash over a wall to get away and use your ult to create more distance :/..
